Alert Name: bush
U.S. slams China, Russia, Canada on piracy
Lawmakers charge countries with  copyright theft amid billions of dollars lost in sales each year in the United States because of piracy.
05/17/07 04:13 PM, EDT
U.S. lawmakers branded China and Russia the world's two biggest copyright thieves Thursday, just a few days before the Bush administration hosts Chinese officials for high-level talks.
FULL STORY
